casebody.data:
STATE v. PEARCY No. COA04-880 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed May 3, 2005. Certification Date May 23, 2005. Appeal from the Buncombe (03CRS55840, 03CRS13109, 03CRS55837, 03CRS55838, 03CRS55839).

Case reported without published opinion. No error in part; reversed in part as to defendant's conviction for driving while license revoked in case number 03CRS55837.
